title: Identify Customer Churn Risk
description: A system analyzes customer behavior to identify those at risk of churning (i.e., ceasing to be a customer).

tasks.description: Analyze customer data against churn indicators (e.g., decreased purchase frequency, stopped opening emails, recently returned an item).
tasks.expected_outcome: System calculates a 'churn risk score' for each customer.

tasks.description: Generate a list of customers with a churn risk score above 80%.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a segment of 'at-risk' customers.

tasks.description: Create a task for the marketing team to target this segment with a special 'We miss you' re-engagement offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a task in the marketing team's queue.
